blog.title: Untitled
blog.description:
A place to write my thoughts.

I like Marvel, DC, Harry Potter & Star Wars.

I have my specific ships and otps.

Multi-fandom

body:
Peter and Felicia headcanons p.2

  • In return, Felicia would listen to Peter whenever he had something on his mind. But that rarely happened. He didn’t like to plague her with his troubles.
  • Even if Peter was exhausted, he would always lay awake for her phone call.
  • Felicia would constantly apologise for keeping him up so late. Knowing he had much better things to do than speak to her till she fell asleep.
  • Peter would always brush off her worries, he loved their late night conversations.
  • It soon became routine for the two of them. Felicia wouldn’t be able to sleep if sometimes, Peter was too busy. Her mind filled with worry and wouldn’t be eased until she heard his voice.

  • Felicia would constantly apologise for keeping him up so late. Knowing he had much better things to do than speak to her till she fell asleep.
  • Peter would always brush off her worries, he loved their late night conversations.

summary:
MJ: Dude, you're shaking. How much coffee did you drink today?
Peter, shaking violently: I haven't had any coffee today..
Peter,...
body:
MJ: Dude, you’re shaking. How much coffee did you drink today?

Peter, shaking violently: I haven’t had any coffee today..

Peter, to Ned later: This is my 27th cup

blog.name: mangomorales
blog.title: —i think your love would be too much

summary: Hey you should totally do like a Gwen Stacey x reader where they hold hands for the first time from the request thingy 👭
question: Hey you should totally do like a Gwen Stacey x reader where they hold hands for the first time from the request thingy 👭
answer:
yEESS

how the queen-i mean gwen stacy holds your hand:

  • gwen really wants to hold your hand!
  • she just doesn’t know how to initiate the hand holding???
  • how to affection™
  • tbh she doesn’t initiate the hand holding
  • you do
  • she immediately freezes
  • “ohmygodareyouokayamimakingyouuncomfortable-”
  • “nO-i mean no. you’re fine.”
  • lowkey excited!
  • loves how your hand fits in hers
  • her hands are actually FREEZING
  • they’re always cold
  • you always warm them up tho
  • she used to only let you hold her hand in private but now she proudly lets people know you’re hers in public

oof im so sorry it’s short!!! i rarely write for gwen so my ideas were limited!

blog.name: mangomorales
blog.title: —i think your love would be too much

tags: spider man: into the spider verse
summary: 👫/👬/👭: the first time [character name] holds your hand w/ RIPeter, if you write for him? :'))
question: 👫/👬/👭: the first time [character name] holds your hand w/ RIPeter, if you write for him? :'))
answer:
oof i can totally write for ripeter!! he may be a little ooc (or totally ooc) ive never written him before!

how ripeter holds your hand:

  • hes totally confident when he thinks about holding your hand
  • he’ll be smooth and flirty-
  • but tbh that doesn’t happen
  • immediately gets shy when he sees an opportunity
  • has second thoughts
  • but ultimately says “screw it” (our good boy ripeter doesn’t curse!) and holds your hand
  • both of yall are flustered omfgggg
  • tries to make it less awkward but ultimately makes it more awkward with pickup lines
  • “uh sorry my hand was heavy. i needed you to hold it”
  • his hands are MAD sweaty
  • you won’t say shit tho
  • hes just bein all cute and shit so you give him a kiss on the cheek
  • he goes wide eyed and looks like he smoked 6 lbs of weed
  • he feels like he smoked 6 lbs of weed
  • “i love you”
  • “i love you more”

blog.name: marvelheroperil
blog.title: Marvel Superheroes in Peril
blog.description: This is a backup blog to the sideblog MarvelPeril in case it gets deactivated. This blog dedicates to Marvel superheroes falling into perilous situations such as getting captured, hurt or whatever. Note that there WON'T be any pictures of superheroes from live-action Marvel movies/TV Shows.
